title: Goa Overview
content: Goa is a coastal state in India known for its beaches, seafood, nightlife, Portuguese heritage and historic churches. Main tourist areas: North Goa (Baga, Calangute, Anjuna), South Goa (Colva, Palolem). Popular activities: beach time, water sports, sightseeing at Fort Aguada, Basilica of Bom Jesus, and night markets.

title: North Goa - Day plan
content: Morning: Fort Aguada and Sinquerim. Afternoon: Calangute and Baga beaches, water sports. Evening: Saturday Night Market at Arpora (if open), beach shacks for dinner.

title: South Goa - Day plan
content: Morning: Relax at Palolem/Colva beach. Afternoon: Dolphin-spotting boat trip. Evening: Quiet beach dinner and strolling.

title: Heritage spots
content: Basilica of Bom Jesus (Old Goa), Se Cathedral, churches and Portuguese-style houses in Fontainhas, Panjim.
